00061 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 //  Includes
00063 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 #include <xercesc/sax/SAXParseException.hpp>
00065 #include "DOMTreeErrorReporter.hpp"
00066 #if defined(XERCES_NEW_IOSTREAMS)
00067 #include <iostream>
00068 #else
00069 #include <iostream.h>
00070 #endif
00071 #include <stdlib.h>
00072 #include <string.h>
00073 
00074 
00075 void DOMTreeErrorReporter::warning(const SAXParseException&)
00076 {
00077     //
00078     // Ignore all warnings.
00079     //
00080 }
00081 
00082 void DOMTreeErrorReporter::error(const SAXParseException& toCatch)
00083 {
00084     fSawErrors = true;
00085     XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr << "Error at file \"" << StrX(toCatch.getSystemId())
00086          << "\", line " << toCatch.getLineNumber()
00087          << ", column " << toCatch.getColumnNumber()
00088          << "\n   Message: " << StrX(toCatch.getMessage()) << XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER endl;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void DOMTreeErrorReporter::fatalError(const SAXParseException& toCatch)
00092 {
00093     fSawErrors = true;
00094     XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER cerr << "Fatal Error at file \"" << StrX(toCatch.getSystemId())
00095          << "\", line " << toCatch.getLineNumber()
00096          << ", column " << toCatch.getColumnNumber()
00097          << "\n   Message: " << StrX(toCatch.getMessage()) << XERCES_STD_QUALIFIER endl;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void DOMTreeErrorReporter::resetErrors()
00101 {
00102     fSawErrors = false;
00103 }
